articles.title: American fighter Chris Weidman was rushed to hospital after shattering his leg 17 seconds into a UFC fight - Insider
articles.description: The middleweight was stretchered out of the arena and lost a fight without opponent Uriah Hall throwing one strike, as he suffered a brutal injury.
articles.content:

articles.title: US ex-cop Chauvin to be sentenced 16 June for George Floyd murder - News24
articles.description: Sacked US police officer Derek Chauvin will be sentenced on June 16 for the murder of African American George Floyd in a case that sparked nationwide anti-racism protests.
articles.content:
